languages.text: {n}План Комиссара дерзок и, наверняка, имеет немного шансов на успех. Но маловероятно, что хоть кто-то в Комморре ожидает столь решительной диверсии со стороны пленников. А значит, на стороне Комиссара и его людей будет эффект неожиданности.{/n}

{n}The Commissar's plan is bold, and the odds of it succeeding are bleak. However, it seems improbable that anyone in Commorragh is prepared for such decisive covert action from the city's prisoners, so the Commissar and his people have the element of surprise on their side.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}План Комиссара дерзок и, наверняка, имеет немного шансов на успех. Но маловероятно, что хоть кто-то в Комморре ожидает столь решительной диверсии со стороны пленников. А значит, на стороне Комиссара и его людей будет эффект неожиданности.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar's plan is bold, and the odds of it succeeding are likely bleak. However, it seems improbable that anyone in Commorragh is prepared for such decisive covert action from prisoners. Therefore, the Commissar and his people have the element of surprise on their side.{/n}

{n}The Commissar's plan is bold, and the odds of it succeeding are likely bleak. However, it seems improbable that anyone in Commorragh is prepared for such decisive covert action from prisoners. Therefore, the Commissar and his people have the element of surprise on their side.{/n}

{n}The Commissar's plan is bold, and the odds of it succeeding are bleak. However, it seems improbable that anyone in Commorragh is prepared for such decisive covert action from the city's prisoners, so the Commissar and his people have the element of surprise on their side.{/n}

{n}The Commissar's plan is bold, and the odds of it succeeding are bleak. However, it seems improbable that anyone in Commorragh is prepared for such decisive covert action from the city's prisoners, so the Commissar and his people have the element of surprise on their side.{/n}

{n}The Commissar's plan is bold, and the odds of it succeeding are bleak. However, it seems improbable that anyone in Commorragh is prepared for such decisive covert action from the city's prisoners, so the Commissar and his people have the element of surprise on their side.{/n}

languages.text: {n}政委的计划很大胆，能顺利实施的希望相当渺茫。不过，科摩罗似乎相当缺乏戒备。因为似乎没人能想到，囚犯们居然会采取如此果决的秘密计划。因此，政委和他的人或许能将敌人打个措手不及。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's plan is bold, and the odds of it succeeding are bleak. However, it seems improbable that anyone in Commorragh is prepared for such decisive covert action from the city's prisoners, so the Commissar and his people have the element of surprise on their side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}政委的计划很大胆，能顺利实施的希望相当渺茫。不过，科摩罗似乎相当缺乏戒备。因为似乎没人能想到，囚犯们居然会采取如此果决的秘密计划。因此，政委和他的人或许能将敌人打个措手不及。{/n}

languages.text: {n}コミッサーの計画は大胆で、成功する確率は限りなく低いかもしれない。しかし、街の囚人がこのような隠密行動を行うことなどコモラフの住民はまったく予想しないだろうから、その点ではコミッサーと彼の仲間は有利だと思われる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's plan is bold, and the odds of it succeeding are bleak. However, it seems improbable that anyone in Commorragh is prepared for such decisive covert action from the city's prisoners, so the Commissar and his people have the element of surprise on their side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーの計画は大胆で、成功する確率は限りなく低いかもしれない。しかし、街の囚人がこのような隠密行動を行うことなどコモラフの住民はまったく予想しないだろうから、その点ではコミッサーと彼の仲間は有利だと思われる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El plan del Comisario es atrevido y sus probabilidades de éxito son escasas. No obstante, no parece probable que nadie en toda Commorragh esté preparado para una operación encubierta tan decisiva por parte de sus prisioneros, de modo que el Comisario y los suyos tienen el elemento de la sorpresa de su parte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's plan is bold, and the odds of it succeeding are bleak. However, it seems improbable that anyone in Commorragh is prepared for such decisive covert action from the city's prisoners, so the Commissar and his people have the element of surprise on their side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El plan del Comisario es atrevido y sus probabilidades de éxito son escasas. No obstante, no parece probable que nadie en toda Commorragh esté preparado para una operación encubierta tan decisiva por parte de sus prisioneros, de modo que el Comisario y los suyos tienen el elemento de la sorpresa de su parte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le plan du commissaire ne manque pas d'audace, mais ses chances de succès sont bien minces. Toutefois, vous vous dites que personne à Commorragh ne peut s'attendre à ce que les prisonniers lancent un tel assaut et que l'effet de surprise pourrait bien faire pencher la balance du côté du commissaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's plan is bold, and the odds of it succeeding are bleak. However, it seems improbable that anyone in Commorragh is prepared for such decisive covert action from the city's prisoners, so the Commissar and his people have the element of surprise on their side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le plan du commissaire ne manque pas d'audace, mais ses chances de succès sont bien minces. Toutefois, vous vous dites que personne à Commorragh ne peut s'attendre à ce que les prisonniers lancent un tel assaut et que l'effet de surprise pourrait bien faire pencher la balance du côté du commissaire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Plan des Kommissars ist kühn, die Erfolgschancen sind gering. Andererseits rechnet wohl niemand in Commorragh mit einer so entschlossenen Geheimaktion von den Gefangenen der Stadt – der Kommissar und seine Leute haben definitiv das Überraschungsmoment auf ihrer Seite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's plan is bold, and the odds of it succeeding are bleak. However, it seems improbable that anyone in Commorragh is prepared for such decisive covert action from the city's prisoners, so the Commissar and his people have the element of surprise on their side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Plan des Kommissars ist kühn, die Erfolgschancen sind gering. Andererseits rechnet wohl niemand in Commorragh mit einer so entschlossenen Geheimaktion von den Gefangenen der Stadt – der Kommissar und seine Leute haben definitiv das Überraschungsmoment auf ihrer Seite.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Komiser'in planı cesurca olsa da başarı ihtimali düşük. Diğer yandan Commorragh'taki kimse, şehirdeki mahkûmlardan böyle gizli bir eylemi beklemez. Bu yüzden Komiser ve yanındakiler, güçlü bir sürpriz avantajına sahip.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's plan is bold, and the odds of it succeeding are bleak. However, it seems improbable that anyone in Commorragh is prepared for such decisive covert action from the city's prisoners, so the Commissar and his people have the element of surprise on their side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser'in planı cesurca ama başarılı olma oranı düşük. Fakat Commorragh'taki kimse, şehrin mahkûmlarından böyle bir gizli eylemi beklemez. Bu yüzden Komiser ve yanındakilerin elinde güçlü bir sürpriz unsuru var.{/n}
